summary:
WORK IN PROGRESS
<br />This mod will make WitheRun like a city
descriptionHtml:
Hi
<br />
<br />This is my first mod
<br />work in progress
<br />first step : level design : meshes, textures, navmeshes (still working)
<br />second step : population : citizens, soldiers, commanders, animals, creatures
<br />last step : quests
<br />-the skyguardians (based on falmer's story)
<br />-where are my people?
<br />-vengeance
<br />
<br />in little words, I wanted to make more density in this fabulous game so I've decided to modding this place
<br />For now, WhiteRun is still in progress work
<br />I've didn't installed others mod
<br />
<br />requierement:
<br />
<br />Skyrim game
<br />Dragonborn DLC
<br />Dawnguard DLc
<br />
<br />(sorry for my english )
<br />
<br />have fun
author: DanMarama
